Class Library

java.lang.Object
Library
public class Library extends Object
Used as a collection class for both patrons and books
Version:
2
Author:
Kamil Pawlowski

    • validifyBookID

      public boolean validifyBookID(String IDIn)
      Checks whether or not a book ID is valid. This is done by comparing its ID with every Book ID in the Book List and seeing if it already occured somewhere

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook(String IDIn)
      Returns a book. Takes the inserted ID and compares it with the ID's of all Books in Book List. When it finds one that has the same ID it changes its avail to true.

    • numberOfAvailBooks
